name: Winter Solstice Aromatic Oil
description:
A 13 oil blend of warmth & comfort.
Sparkling, effervescent Citrus notes of 5 Fold Orange, Lime & Litsea open up to reveal middle notes of Neroli, Myrrh, Frankincense, Ginger & Cinnamon leaf, then at itâ€™s base a heavy concoction of 10 Fold Vanilla Oleoresin, Himalayan Cedar oil, Indian Amber oil & aged Patchouli with the barest hint of Clove Buds, all infused with premium dark Amber resin and Orris root.
A luxurious blend to mimic the scent of Cathedral incense 
wafting out of a golden censer at Yuletide. 

Net wt: 5ml

name: Winter Solstice Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Design: Pale layers of Lapis blue, tainted with a sprinkle of darkness and dusted with midnight blue glitter.

The Scent: A 13 oil blend of warmth & comfort.
Effervescent notes of 5 Fold Orange & Lime open up to reveal soft notes of Neroli, Myrrh, Frankincense & Ginger, all resting on a base heavy concoction of 10 Fold Vanilla, Himalayan Cedar, Indian Amber & aged Patchouli with the barest hint of Clove Buds. A luxurious blend to mimic the scent of Cathedral 
incense at Yuletide. 

Net wt: Not less than 4oz / 112g

Ingredients: Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Sodium rapeseedate, Aqua, Sodium hydroxide, Citrus sinensis (sweet orange) essential oil, Pogostemon cablin (patchouli) essential oil, Boswellia carteri (Frankincense) essential oil, Commiphora myrrha (myrrh) essential oil, Citrus aurantifolia (lime) essential oil, Litsea cubeba essential oil, Pinus succinifera (amber) essential oil, Citrus aurantium (bitter orange) essential oil, Cedarus deodora (cedar wood) essential oil, Vanilla plantifolia (vanilla) oil, Zingiber officinale (ginger) essential oil, Cinnamomum zeylanicum (cinnamon) leaf oil, Syzgium aromaticum (clove) bud oil, Cosmetic glitter, *Citral, *Limonene, *Eugenol, *Linalool, *Citronellol. (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

name: Winter Solstice Body Whip
description:
The Scent: A 13 oil blend of warmth & comfort.
Effervescent notes of 5 Fold Orange & Lime open up to reveal soft notes of Neroli, Myrrh, Frankincense & Ginger, all resting on a base heavy concoction of 10 Fold Vanilla, Himalayan Cedar, Indian Amber & aged Patchouli with the barest hint of Clove Buds. A luxurious blend to mimic the scent of Cathedral 
incense at Yuletide. 

Net wt: 180g

NB: This particular cream has Extra Virgin Olive oil in place of our usual Rice Bran oil.

name: Railroad Markets Whipped Soap
description:
The Scent: Freshly-cut Limes & Sugar Rocks imported from the West Indies, Mangoes from India & Coconuts from Fiji - all available this Friday form your local Railroad Markets!

Net wt: 90g

name: Seville Orange Whipped Soap
description:
The Scent: Oozy, sticky Orange jam on a bed of fresh-out-of-the-oven flaky pastry, iced with a powdered sugar glaze.

Net wt: 90g.

name: Snowdrift Whipped Soap
description:
The Scent: A warming blend of Hot Milk, Honey & Oatmeal with a sugary lick of pure white Marzipan. Like a cuddle from Grandma with an additional 'there there'.

Net wt: 90g.

name: Sylph Whipped Soap
description:
The Scent: A sylph's sachet.  Clouds of fluffed up Marshmallows infused with a glug of classic Lavender oil.

Net wt: 90g

name: Yuletide Bough Whipped Soap
description:
The Scent: Warm, spicy notes of Cardamom, Frankincense & Pink Pepper combined with green Galbanum & Mistletoe on a bed of Patchouli, winter florals & dry woods.

Net wt: 90g.

name: Scented Wax Melts - You choose
description:
FuturePrimitive Wax Melts are the ideal way to scent your home with unique, hand-blended fragrances. 
Made with EcoSoya Wax - a natural, soft & clean-burning wax, our wax melts are highly scented and will begin to scent your home within minutes.  
You can even mix & match by breaking off pieces of several different complimentary scents.  A whole world of home-scenting is open to you by using your imagination!

Each snap-off square will provide you with up to 5 hours of aroma.

Choose your scents by using the drop-down arrow.

Net wt: e 50g

WARNING: If you are using a warmer, which requires a flame underneath it please take caution.  Never leave a flame unattended.  Keep your warmer out of the reach of children & pets and keep away from any items, which can be damaged by heat.

THE SCENTS:

HOT SPICED CIDER: Country Apple Cider infused with Citrus fruits, Cinnamon sticks, Vanilla pods & Nutmeg dust.

ROOK & RAVEN: A dark, mystifying blend of Sicilian Orange & Aged Patchouli with a dry-down of Sandalwood & Blackened Vanilla.

THE WARRIOR: A salty, wooden warship misted with sea-spray.  The scent of tarred rope, crates of Israeli figs, citrus fruits & rich spices warmed by the sun & the rarest Frankincense & Amber resins wrapped in sail cloth.

FESTIVAL: A heady waft of Nag Champa incense dipped in thick, black Indonesian Patchouli with a passing puff of smoke from a travellers' house on wheels.

THE ANCIENTS: A squeeze of Red Mandarin oil, a glug of Black Pathouli and a trickle of Ylang Ylang blossom oil evokes daydreams of a world gone by. 

MIDNIGHT MARAUDER IN THE AURORA: Dark Wood, Forest Bracken, Pine & Black Spruce surrounded with notes of Ozone & Raw Sugar.

MONK'S WALK: An old Monk's Walkway lit with winter snow and glowing, black lanterns.  An ancient brass incense burner softly smoulders, giving off the aroma of warming Frankincense & Myrrh resins, lifted slightly with Red Mandarin oil and finished with a smidge of Sandalwood. 
Contains pure oils of Frankincense & dark, sticky Myrrh.

BLUE AMBERWOOD: Fresh Citrus top notes of Grapefruit & Lime with a heart of Blue Agave, resting on a bed of Amber, Dark Chocolate & Vetiver.

WINTER SOLSTICE: The Scent: A 13 oil blend of warmth & comfort. Effervescent notes of 5 Fold Orange & Lime open up to reveal soft notes of Neroli, Myrrh, Frankincense & Ginger, all resting on a base heavy concoction of 10 Fold Vanilla, Himalayan Cedar, Indian Amber & aged Patchouli with the barest hint of Clove Buds. A luxurious blend to mimic the scent of Cathedral 
incense at Yuletide.

name: Aromatic oil - you choose
description:
Choose your oil by using the drop down arrow.

Sample sizes are available in the samples dept.

name: Bubbling Sugar Buff 2oz samples
description:
Try our new Bubbling Sugar Buff exfoliant in these dinky little sample pots before buying your favourite in a full size 6oz jar.

Use the drop down arrow to choose your scent. 
If a certain scent isn't showing it means we are out of stock at the moment.

name: Body Whip 2oz samples
description:
Try our Body Whips in these dinky little sample pots before buying your favourite in a full size 8oz jar.

Use the drop down arrow to choose your scent.
If a certain scent isn't showing it means we are out of stock at the moment.

Net wt: 2oz/56g.

name: Soap Samples - you choose
description:
Individually wrapped soap samples.
Choose your scent by using the drop down arrow.
Descriptions of all the scents are available by browsing the Handmade Soap dept.

You will receive a 20-30g soap sample wrapped in our own branded wrap with mini cigar band detailing the full ingredients.

A great way to try any of our soaps before committing to a full bar.
We advise you to try a few to make postage costs worth while!

Please note, if a certain soap does not show in the drop down list it means we are out of stock of the samples.

name: Olfactory Bathing Grains (you choose the scent)
description:
Scent list:

GENERAL CATALOGUE SCENTS: 

BLACK HONEY - British Hedgerow Honey, Warm spices, Dry leaves, Lemons and Mandarins.

CHOCOLATIER: Dark artisan chocolate made in an old back street shoppe with tiny leaded windows. The scent of orange-infused pure cacao chocolate with Fig Syrup, Tahitian Vanilla Beans & West Indian Almond.

ELIJAH'S COMFORT: Victorian citrus top notes of Sweet Sicilian Orange, freshly-harvested Ylang Ylang blooms, Lemongrass sticks & Geranium leaves with a soft heart of Old English Tea Roses.

ETHEREAL SEAS - Basil leaf, Lime zest, Ho Wood and Mandarin essential oils to mimic British Seaside Flora.

INCHES LANE: The perfect combo for when colds & flu attack! Eucalyptus, Rosemary, Lemon, Pine & a dash of Patchouli to uplift, comfort and warm you, whilst gently helping to clear the nasal passages!

FESTIVAL: A heady waft of Nag Champa incense dipped in thick, black Indonesian Patchouli with a passing puff of smoke from a travellers' house on wheels.

LAGOON: The Scent: A stumble across an island Lagoon. A true breath of fresh, clean air.  Lavender, Bourbon Geranium & Dark Patchouli are blended together perfectly to relax & soothe the mind.

LEMONADE LOUNGER: Sweet, tangy lemons & lemon leaves soaked in a Vanilla bean broth with a hint of garden soil.

NIU KAFA: Wild Niu Kafa coconut meat doused in sugar syrup & Madagascan Vanilla oil, a host of Brazilian spices smuggled from a cargo ship in old Pompey, a trickle of Mexican Cocoa absolute and finally a few droplets of pure Indian Amber oil.

ROOK & RAVEN: A dark, deeply mystifying blend of Sweet Sicilian Orange with a drydown of aged Patchouli, Sandalwood & Blackened Vanilla.

SHADOW SHOW: Blackened Pomegranate juice & Plum compote spiked with Pink Peppercorn, Clove & Cinnamon with base notes of Frankincense, Patchouli, Amber, Moss & Caramelised sugar.

WHITE WITCH: The Hubble Bubble of a decoction. 
Deepest tones of Black Indonesian Patchouli, balanced with Bourbon Geranium.

Net wt: 8.9oz / 250g

name: Midnight Marauder in the Aurora Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Design: A diagonal line separates light from dark. One side neutral, one side like a night sky, dotted with stars, the top dusted with coloured, shredded glitter.

The Scent: Dark Wood, Forest Bracken, Pine & Black Spruce surrounded with notes of Ozone & Raw Sugar.

Net wt: not less than 3.5oz.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Sodium rapeseedate, Aqua, Sodium hydroxide, Parfum, Activated charcoal, CI77007, Benzyl benzoate, Coumarin, Cosmetic glitter.

name: Autumn Equinox Aromatic Oil (Extrait)
description:
A cold North wind swoops its way South, the gusts carrying curious scents of Dark Forest Woods, Black Labdanum, Autumn spice notes of Cardamom, Nutmeg, Fresh Ginger & White Pepper.  The wind stops short and broods at the doors of an old town library.  Shelves of polished Oak hold ancient copies of long-lost scriptures, a brass chalice holds incense offerings of Opoponax, Frankincense & Blood Orange, the contents left untouched & covered with a thin veil of dust.

100% essential & absolute oil blend with a single tear of Frankincense.
Supplied in a 6ml amber glass bottle and presented in a black organza bag with mini postcard.

name: Sylph Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Design: A mottled appearance! Soft lilac swirls within a neutral stone coloured base.

The Scent: A sylph's sachet. 
Clouds of fluffed up Marshmallows infused with a glug of classic Lavender oil.

Net wt: not less than 3.5oz.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Sodium 
rapeseedate, Aqua, Sodium hydroxide, Parfum, Lavandula angustifolia (lavender) essential oil, Sucrose (caramelised sugar), CI77007, Activated charcoal, *limonene, *linalool, *geraniol (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

name: Bar Humbug! Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Design: A base of linen white with swirls of pitch black and handfuls of cocoa-dusted soap balls.

The Scent: The cool, refreshing scent of Peppermint Creams from and old confectioner's shop.
Crisp Peppermint and sweet Spearmint infused with Madagascan Vanilla.  The scent of British Humbugs!
100% essential oil blend.

Net wt: not less than 4oz.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Sodium rapeseedate, Aqua, Sodium hydroxide, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) butter, Mentha piperata, Mentha spicata, CI77891, Vanilla planifolia, Activated charcoal, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) powder, *limonene, *linalool, *vanillin (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

name: Black Honey Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Style: Warm, golden honey with a light dusting of cocoa, cooled with a charcoal top and a scattering of Calendula petals.

The Scent: Our own hand-blended honey accord with a little something extra!
Freshly potted British Hedgerow Honey, Warm Spices, Dry Leaves, Lemons & Mandarins.

How the bar feels: A smooth base with a slightly exfoliating top due to the Activated Charcoal.

Net wt: not less than 4oz.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Sodium rapeseedate, Aqua, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) butter, In-house essential oil blend, Activated charcoal, Curcuma ionga root extract, CI77492, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) powder, Calendula officinalis petals, *citral, *limonene, *(occurs naturally in essential oil).

NB: Does not contain real honey

name: Black Honey Body Whip
description:
The Scent: Freshly potted British Hedgerow Honey, Warm Spices, Dry Leaves, Lemons & Mandarins.

How it arrives: 180g in a plastic jar with padded black lid. 
Samples sizes available in samples dept.

name: Chocolatier Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Style': Rich, dark chocolate cloaked in cream with spheres of cocoa dusted truffles and an orange drizzle.

The Scent: Dark artisan chocolate made in an old back street shoppe with tiny leaded windows. The scent of orange-infused pure cacao chocolate with Fig Syrup, Tahitian Vanilla Beans & West Indian Almond.  

Nourishment: Pure, un-adulterated Kenyan Cocoa butter.

How the bar feels: Sumptuous chocolate powder gives the bar a really soft feel.  The lather is creamy and silky.

Net wt: A 4-5oz chunk packaged in our own biodegradable wrap with cigar band detailing the full ingredients list.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Aqua, Sodium olivate, Sodium sunflowerate, Sodium hydroxide, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) butter, In-House fragrance blend, Theobroma cacao (powder), CI77891, CI77492, *limonene (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

name: Chocolatier Body Whip
description:
The Scent: Dark artisan chocolate made in an old back street shoppe with tiny leaded windows. The scent of orange-infused pure cacao chocolate with Fig Syrup, Tahitian Vanilla Beans & West Indian Almond. 

How it arrives: An 8oz (180g) plastic jar with padded black lid. 
Samples sizes available in samples dept.

name: Cratchit Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Design: An Indian yellow base with creamy white droplets and swirls, a handful of pure Arabica coffee throughout, and a peaked topping scattered with Scottish Oatmeal.

The Scent: A warm ochre glow shining out of the humble home of Bob Cratchit.  A glowing hearth crackling with Pine wood, Orange zests & Cassia sticks, and Christingles studded with Cloves hang from velvet ribbons, infusing the air with hope & joy.
100% essential oil blend.

Net wt: not less than 4oz.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Sodium rapeseedate, Aqua, Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, Sodium sunflowerate, In-house essential oil blend, CI77891, Capsicum annum, Coffea arabica, CI77492, *limonene, *linalool, *cinnamal, *eugenol, *benzyl benzoate, *isoeugenol, *geraniol, *citral (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

name: Cratchit Bubbling Sugar Buff
description:
The Scent: A warm ochre glow shining out of the humble home of Bob Cratchit.  A glowing hearth crackling with Pine wood, Orange zests & Cassia sticks, and Christingles studded with Cloves hang from velvet ribbons, infusing the air with hope & joy.
100% essential oil blend.

Net wt: 168g / 6oz

name: Cratchit Body Whip
description:
The Scent: A warm ochre glow shining out of the humble home of Bob Cratchit.  A glowing hearth crackling with Pine wood, Orange zests & Cassia sticks, and Christingles studded with Cloves hang from velvet ribbons, infusing the air with hope & joy.
100% essential oil blend.

Net wt: 180g / 6.42oz

name: Ebeneezer Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Design: A cool, glacial blue with droplets of snowy white and a spoonful of green parsley speckles.

The Scent: A miserly cold winter breath moans down a chimney breast and into a dark, grey-washed room.  The scent of frosted Pine needles & Eucalyptus leaves encased in ice make way for a hopeful splash of clean Lemongrass & fresh Lime.
100% essential oil blend.

Net wt: not less than 4oz.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Sodium rapeseedate, Aqua, Sodium hydroxide, Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, Sodium sunflowerate, Eucalyptus globulus, Pinus sylvestris, Citrus aurantifolia, Cymbopogon flexuosus, Kaolin, CI77891, CI77007, CI77289, Carum petroselinum (parsley) leaf, *limonene, *linalool, *citral, *geraniol, *eugenol, *citronellol (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

name: Ebeneezer Bubbling Sugar Buff
description:
The Scent: A miserly cold winter breath moans down a chimney breast and into a dark, grey-washed room.  The scent of frosted Pine needles & Eucalyptus leaves encased in ice make way for a hopeful splash of clean Lemongrass & fresh Lime.
100% essential oil blend.

Net wt: 168g / 6oz

name: Ebeneezer Body Whip
description:
The Scent: A miserly cold winter breath moans down a chimney breast and into a dark, grey-washed room.  The scent of frosted Pine needles & Eucalyptus leaves encased in ice make way for a hopeful splash of clean Lemongrass & fresh Lime.
100% essential oil blend.

Net wt: 180g / 6.42oz.

name: Elijahs Comfort Handmade Soap
description:
Soap style : House white with blood red droplets & swirls.  An homage to Elijah Comfort - renowned British potter in the 1930's and the Great Great Grandfather of Matt (my potter partner).

The Scent: A host of citrus top notes, freshly-harvested Ylang Ylang blooms, earthy Lemongrass sticks & fragrant Pelargonium leaves finished with a soft heart of Old English Tea Roses.  100% essential oil blend.

Nourishment: Organic un-refined cocoa butter. The red colour is organic Australian red clay, which is excellent for toning the skin of more mature souls.

How the bar feels: Smooth and texturised from the additional rose petals inside the red portion. Very creamy.

Net wt: A 4-5oz chunk in our own branded biodegradable wrap.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Aqua, Sodium rapeseedate, Sodium hydroxide, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) butter, In-house essential oil blend, Australian organic red clay, Rosa damascena (rose) petals, *limonene, *linalool, *citral, *geraniol, *citronellol, *benzyl benzoate, *benzyl cinnamate, *benzyl salicylate, *farnesol, *benzyl alcohol (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

name: Elijah's Comfort Bubbling Sugar Buff
description: The Scent: Victorian citrus top notes, freshly-harvested Ylang Ylang blooms, Lemongrass sticks & Geranium leaves with a soft heart of Old English Tea Roses.

name: Elijahs Comfort Body Whip
description:
Scentin': Victorian citrus top notes of Sweet Sicilian Orange, freshly-harvested Ylang Ylang blooms, Lemongrass sticks & Geranium leaves with a soft heart of Old English Tea Roses.  

How it arrives: 8oz jar with black padded lid.
Samples available in the samples dept.

name: Festival Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Style: The A303 road to Glastonbury, Stonehenge & the Devonshire countryside.  The colours of the Summer Solstice & Gypsy Caravans. Swirls of tapestry greens, reds, blues & golds on a Dead Sea Mud base with dried flower topping.

The Scent: A heady waft of Nag Champa incense dipped in thick, black Indonesian Patchouli with a passing puff of smoke from a travellers' house on wheels.

How the bar feels: The raw dead sea mud gives mild exfoliation, whilst the lather is thick, dense and creamy.

Net wt: A 4-5oz chunk packaged in our branded wrap with a simple black & white cigar band.

Ingredients: Sodium rapeseedate, Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Aqua, Sodium hydroxide, In-house scent blend, Dead Sea Mud, CI77289, CI77492, CI77007, Australian red clay.

name: Festival Bubbling Sugar Buff
description: The Scent: A heady waft of Nag Champa incense dipped in thick, black Indonesian Patchouli with a passing puff of smoke from a travellers' house on wheels.

name: Festival Body Whip
description:
The Scent': A heady waft of Nag Champa incense dipped in thick, black Indonesian Patchouli with a passing puff of smoke from a travellers' house on wheels.

How it arrives: 8oz (180g) plastic jar with padded black lid.
Samples available in the samples dept.

name: In The Pines Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Design: A gradient of soil brown & spruce green topped with off white peaks with more spruce green swirls & a dusting of iridescent glitter.

The Scent: In the pines where the sun never shines...except for today!  Siberian fir & Scotch Pine reach towards a winter blue sky, their roots surrounded by a blanket of snow and hidden deep beneath, the last flower heads of summer Lavender.
100% essential oil blend.

Net wt: not less than 4oz.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Sodium rapeseedate, Aqua, Sodium hydroxide, Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, Abies siberica, Pinus sylvestris, Lavandula angustifolia, Cinnamomum camphora, Cedarus deodora, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) powder, Chlorella vulgaris extract, Cosmetic glitter, *linalool, *limonene, *geraniol, (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

name: The Lamplighter Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Design: A neutral base with Mahogany-coloured droplets and swirls with the lightest dusting of shimmering glitter.

The Scent: Christmas Eve night, the skies filled with softly falling snow and a deep quietness.
The Lamplighter with match in hand casts an amber glow across the street.  The aroma of frosted red berries, dusky Eucalyptus leaves and a hint of snowy air graces your nose.  Sleep tight...
Essential oil/fragrance blend.

Net wt: not less than 4oz.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Sodium rapeseedate, Aqua, Sodium hydroxide, Parfum, Eucalyptus globulus, *limonene, *Butyphenyl methylpropional, linalool, hexyl cinnamal (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

name: The Lamplighter Bubbling Sugar Buff
description:
The Scent: Christmas Eve night, the skies filled with softly falling snow and a deep quietness.
The Lamplighter with match in hand casts an amber glow across the street.  The aroma of frosted red berries, dusky Eucalyptus leaves and a hint of snowy air graces your nose.  Sleep tight...
Essential oil/fragrance blend.

Net wt: 168g / 6oz

name: The Lamplighter Body Whip
description:
The Scent: Christmas Eve night, the skies filled with softly falling snow and a deep quietness.
The Lamplighter with match in hand casts an amber glow across the street.  The aroma of frosted red berries, dusky Eucalyptus leaves and a hint of snowy air graces your nose.  Sleep tight...
Essential oil/fragrance blend.

Net wt: 180g /6.42oz.

name: Lemonade Lounger Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Style: A pale lemon yellow base with streaks of Dead Sea Mud, Vanilla pods & paste and contrasting soap balls.

The Scent: Sweet, tangy lemons & lemon leaves soaked in a Vanilla bean broth with a hint of garden soil.

Nourishment: Organic cocoa butter to soften dry skin.

How the bar feels: Wonderful! The earthy lemon scent uplifts the senses, the vanilla pod paste is mildly exfoliating along with the dead sea mud.  A thick, white, creamy lather. 

Net wt: A 4- 5oz chunk wrapped in our own branded wrap with a cigar band detailing the full list of ingredients.

100% Natural.

Ingredients: aqua, sodium cocoate, sodium palmate, sodium olivate, sodium sunflowerate, sodium hydroxide, theobroma cacao (cocoa) butter, In-House essential oil blend, Maris limus (Dead Sea mud), CI77891, CI77492, vanilla planifolia (seed), *citral, *limonene, *linalool, *geraniol, *citronellol (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

Sample sizes are available in the soap samples dept.

name: Lemonade Lounger Body Whip
description:
The Scent: Sweet, tangy lemons & lemon leaves soaked in a Vanilla bean broth with a hint of garden soil.

How it arrives: 8oz plastic jar with padded black lid.
Sample sizes are available in the samples dept.

name: Niu Kafa Handmade soap
description:
Soap style: A deep cocoa brown, caramel, skimming stone white & boot polish black funnel swirl, dusted with multi-faceted copper & bronze mica crystals.

The Scent: Wild Niu Kafa coconut meat doused in sugar syrup & Madagascan Vanilla oil, a host of Brazilian spices smuggled from a cargo ship in old Pompey, a trickle of Mexican Cocoa absolute and finally a few droplets of pure Indian Amber oil.

Nourishment: Organic Cocoa butter from Kenya.

How the bar feels: Like a chunk of stone. Nice silky lather on an ever so smooth bar.

Net wt: A 4-5oz chunk packaged in our own branded wrap with a cigar band detailing the full ingredients list.

Ingredients: Sodium rapeseedate, Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Aqua, Sodium hydroxide,  Theobroma cacao (cocoa) butter, Parfum, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) powder, in-house essential oil/fragrance blend, Activated charcoal, Mica.

name: Niu Kafa Body Whip
description:
The Scent: Wild Niu Kafa coconut meat doused in sugar syrup & Madagascan Vanilla oil, a host of Brazilian spices smuggled from a cargo ship in old Pompey, a trickle of Mexican Cocoa absolute and finally a few droplets of pure Indian Amber oil.

How it arrives: 8oz (180g) plastic jar with padded black lid.
Sample sizes are available in the samples dept.

name: Oliver Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Design: A base of dove-grey and pale cream with random dustings of cocoa.

The Scent: A pale young face dusted with London grime runs from the clutches of the workhouse master.  His pockets filled with with mini wreath's of Myrtle & Rosemary and a fistful of Sage to protect him from an ever gruesome life with Fagin.

Net wt: not less than 4oz.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Sodium rapeseedate, Aqua, Sodium hydroxide, Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, Sodium sunflowerate, Maris limus (dead sea mud), Myrtle communis, Salvia sclarea, Rosmarinus officinalis, Kaolin, CI77004 (Australian olive clay), Theobroma cacao (cocoa) powder, *limonene, *linalool, *geraniol, *eugenol, *coumarin, (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

name: Rook & Raven Handmade Soap
description:
Soap style: A cackling trixter after dark.
A base of charcoal black with contrasting stark white and little rooks & ravens scattered across the top with a dash of mica.

The Scent: A dark, deeply mystifying blend of Sweet Sicilian Orange with a drydown of aged Patchouli, Sandalwood & Blackened Vanilla. 

Nourishment: Swirls of activated charcoal to help rid the skin of toxins are blended with organic Cocoa butter to nourish.

How the bar feels: Lots of exfoliating properties due to the amount of Activated Charcoal used. Thick, creamy lather. Beautiful, sensual scent.

Net wt: A 4-5oz chunk wrapped in our own branded wrap with full ingredients list.

Ingredients: sodium cocoate, sodium palmate, aqua, sodium olivate, sodium sunflowerate, sodium hydroxide, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) butter, in-house fragrance blend, activated charcoal, CI77288, Mica, *limonene (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

name: Rook & Raven Bubbling Sugar Buff
description: The Scent: A dark, deeply mystifying blend of Sweet Sicilian Orange with a drydown of aged Patchouli, Sandalwood & Blackened Vanilla.

name: Rook & Raven Body Whip
description:
The Scent: A dark, deeply mystifying blend of Sweet Sicilian Orange with a drydown of aged Patchouli, Sandalwood & Blackened Vanilla.

How it arrives: 8oz jar plastic jar with padded black lid.
Samples available in the samples dept.

name: Shadow Show Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Style: A mustard yellow base with a menacing black swirl and eerie moons dusted with mica.

The Scent: Blackened Pomegranate juice & Plum compote spiked with Pink Peppercorn, Clove & Cinnamon with base notes of Frankincense, Patchouli, Amber, Moss & Caramelised sugar.

How the bar feels: Smooth and luxurious with a thick, creamy lather.

Net wt: not less than 4oz.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Aqua, Sodium olivate, Sodium soyate, Sodium hydroxide, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) butter, In-House Scent Blend, CI77492, Activated charcoal, Benzyl benzoate, Coumarin, Eugenol, Geraniol, Limonene.

name: Shadow Show Body Whip
description:
The Scent: Blackened Pomegranate juice & Plum compote spiked with Pink Pepper, Clove & Cinnamon with base notes of Frankincense, Patchouli, Amber, Moss & Caramelised sugar.

How it arrives: 180g in a plastic jar with padded black lid.
Samples sizes available in samples dept.

name: Sixpence Pudding Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Design: Christmas Pudding Brown with swirls of pale white, strewn with dried Cranberry fruits, swirls of deep Christmas red and scatterings of dried citrus peel.

The Scent: A dimly-lit back alley on Christmas Eve night.  Snowfall gently hitting the quiet pavement, smouldering Frankincense smoke creeping out of a church doorway and the aroma of steaming Sixpence Puds graces the cold outside air.
100% essential oil blend.

Net wt: not less than 4oz.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Sodium rapeseedate, Aqua, Sodium hydroxide, Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, Vaccinium macrocarpon (cranberry) fruit, In-house essential oil blend), Theobroma cacao (cocoa) powder, Australian red clay, Activated charcoal, *limonene, *linalool, *citral, *geraniol, *citronellol, *eugenol, *benzyl benzoate, *cinnamal, *cinnamal alcohol, *coumarin, *isoeugenol (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

The Scent: A dimly-lit back alley on Christmas Eve night.  Snowfall gently hitting the quiet pavement, smouldering Frankincense smoke creeping out of a church doorway and the aroma of steaming Sixpence Puds graces the cold outside air.
100% essential oil blend.

Net wt: 168g / 6oz.

Net wt: 180g / 6.42oz.

name: Snowdrift Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Design: Simple, beautiful bone white with a flippy, whippy topping!

The Scent: A warming blend of Hot Milk, Honey & Oatmeal with a sugary lick of pure white Marzipan.  
Like a cuddle from Grandma with an additional 'there there'.

Net wt: not less than 4oz.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Sodium rapeseedate, Aqua, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) butter, Parfum, CI77891, Benzyl benzoate, Coumarin.

name: Toffee Moon Face Handmade Soap
description:
Soap Style: A pale beige base strewn with cocoa dusted soap balls & pinhead oatmeal, the top splashed with cooking apple green and a sprinkle of moon dust!

Inspiration: Do you remember The Magic Faraway Tree?  Then you will remember Saucepan Man, Silky & Moonface too!
Housed inside the tree are many 'lands'.  Our favourites include The Land of Spells, The Land of Topsy Turvy, The Land of Magic Medicines and The Land of Goodies.  
Our soap is particularly inspired by Mr. Moonface - who loves to eat Toffee!

The Scent: English Butter Toffee shards, Baked Mandarin rinds & Spiced Apple compote, topped with a Caramelised Sugar nest.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Sodium rapeseedate, Aqua, Sodium hydroxide, Mangifera indica (mango) butter, In-house scent blend, Avena sativa (oat) kernel meal, Chlorella vulgaris extract, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) powder, cosmetic glitter, *limonene, *linalool, cinnamal, hexyl cinnamal, eugenol (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

name: Toffee Moon Face Body Whip
description:
Inspiration: Do you remember The Magic Faraway Tree?  Then you will remember Saucepan Man, Silky & Moonface too!
Housed inside the tree are many 'lands'.  Our favourites include The Land of Spells, The Land of Topsy Turvy, The Land of Magic Medicines and The Land of Goodies.  
Our soap is particularly inspired by Mr. Moonface - who loves to eat Toffee!

The Scent: English Butter Toffee shards, Baked Mandarin rinds & Spiced Apple compote, topped with a Caramelised Sugar nest.


Net wt: 6.42oz /180g  

Samples available in the samples dept.

name: The Wand Maker Handmade Soap
description:
Soap design: An olive green base with swirls of earthy brown & lime white and a topping of medicinal Coltsfoot leaf & a dusting of sparkling silver glitter.

The Scent: Dusty, leather-bound spell books, Cedarwood countertops dressed with lavender-infused beeswax candles, and piles of black wand boxes....their occupiers awaiting their masters.

Net wt: not less than 4oz.

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, Sodium palmate, Sodium rapeseedate, Aqua, Sodium hydroxide, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) butter, Parfum, Cedarus deodora, Lavandula angustifolia, CI77891, CI77289, CI77492, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) powder, Tussliago farfara (coltsfoot) leaf, Cosmetic glitter, Butyphenol methylpropional, *linalool, *limonene, (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

name: The Wand Maker Bubbling Sugar Buff
description:

name: White Witch Handmade Soap
description:
Soap style: Simplistic elegance. Oyster white with a railing black line. A piled-high textured topping which begs to be bitten (don't!).

The scent: The Hubble Bubble of a decoction. 
Our secret ratio! 
Deepest tones of Black Indonesian Patchouli, balanced with Bourbon Geranium. 
This is a simple blend of essential oils - the two compliment each other beautifully. It smells creamy and earthy and pretty all at the same time.  Our top selling soap.  
100% essential oil blend.

Nourishment: Rich un-refined organic cocoa butter gives the soap an ultra-creamy lather, which conditions the skin like no other.

How the bar feels: The ultimate in luxury.  This is our top selling bar for a very good reason. The bar is smooth like stone, whilst the lather is so thick and creamy.  The essential oil blend is ultra-soothing.  

Net wt: A 4-5oz chunk packaged in our own branded biodegradable wrap with full ingredients list.

Ingredients: aqua, sodium cocoate, sodium palmate, sodium olivate, sodium sunflowerate, sodium hydroxide, theobroma cacao (organic seed butter), In-house essential oil blend, CI77891, Activated charcoal, *geraniol, *citronellol, *linalool (*occurs naturally in essential oil).

name: White Witch Body Whip
description:
The Scent: The Hubble Bubble of a decoction from the Cauldron.
Deepest tones of Black Indonesian Patchouli, balanced with Bourbon Geranium. 

How it arrives: 8oz plastic jar with padded black lid.
Sample sizes are available in the samples dept.
